ack.p: We would like to thank Dianna Padilla, Jessica Gurevitch, and Alistair Rogers for helpful comments on earlier versions of this manuscript. We would also like to thank Alistair Rogers and Stefanie Lasota at Brookhaven National Laboratory and David Fischer and Lisa Martel at the Cary Institute of Ecosystem Studies for analytical assistance. This paper is number 1242 contributed by the Stony Brook University Ecology and Evolution graduate program.
